ModMetaData.name: Wall Light - Extended Colors
ModMetaData.author: SineSwiper
ModMetaData.description:
Extended colors for Murmur's Wall Light mod!
Secondary colors: Yellow, Magenta, Cyan Tertiary colors: Rose, Violet, Azure, Spring Green, Chartreuse, Orange
Requires HugsLib and the Wall Light mod, which should both be loaded first.
